name: Basic Membership
description: Access to gym facilities during off-peak hours.
features: Access to cardio and weight equipment

name: Standard Membership
description: Full access to gym facilities and group classes.
features: Free group fitness classes (e.g., yoga, Zumba)

name: Family Membership
description: Special pricing for families of up to 4 members.
features: Access for up to 4 family members

name: Elite Membership
description: Tailored for fitness enthusiasts seeking premium services.
features: Access to exclusive workshops and events
